Rate.name: 速率

S3.name: S3
S3.title: 使用 ILLA Cloud 连接到 Amazon S3，只需点击几下即可构建内部工具。
S3.description: 借助 ILLA Cloud 的 Amazon S3 集成，您可以快速轻松地配置和连接到您的 Amazon S3 存储，以优化您的数据管理并简化您的工作流程。该集成通过利用 S3 API 端点简化了数据管理，允许您读取、写入和操作数据轻松从您的 S3 存储桶中。您可以通过提供输入（包括必要的 API 调用）并结合基于应用程序的验证检查来安全地添加或写入数据。例如，您可以从 S3 存储桶中检索数据并添加一个按钮，单击该按钮会执行 API 调用以更新数据或批准请求。通过 ILLA Cloud 的 Amazon S3 集成，您可以简化数据管理流程并利用 Amazon S3 存储的强大功能来提高您的工作效率。

MySQL.name: MySQL
MySQL.title: 使用 ILLA Cloud 连接到 MySQL，只需点击几下即可构建内部工具。
MySQL.description: 将 ILLA Cloud 与 MySQL 集成可以极大地增强您的工作流程并简化流程。只需几个简单的步骤，您就可以将 ILLA Cloud 连接到您的 MySQL 数据库，使您能够创建以强大的新方式与您的数据交互的用户界面。无论您是需要将数据读入表格网格、创建仪表板，还是添加运行 SQL 查询的自定义操作以写入数据库，ILLA Cloud 都能让您安全高效地轻松完成这些操作。通过使用 ILLA Cloud 连接到您的 MySQL 数据，您可以避免意外删除和其他代价高昂的错误。例如，如果您使用 MySQL 表管理员工费用，您可以使用 ILLA Cloud 将数据读入仪表板，甚至添加一个写回数据库的操作以更新每项费用的批准状态。借助 ILLA Cloud 的简单界面，您可以以清晰和系统的方式定义您想要采取的行动，从而轻松优化您的工作流程并简化您的流程。

Editable text.title: 使用 ILLA Cloud 中的可编辑文本组件，只需点击几下即可构建内部工具。
Editable text.description: ILLA Cloud中的Editable Text组件允许用户在一行文本输入框中输入和编辑文本，输入的文本可以悬停显示。该组件可以通过提供一种快速简便的方式来编辑文本来节省用户的时间。例如，用户可以创建一个收集用户反馈的表单，并使用“可编辑文本”组件允许用户在提交之前编辑他们的评论。这可以通过减少来回通信的需求来帮助企业提高效率。

GraphQL.name: 图形QL
GraphQL.title: 使用 ILLA Cloud 连接到 GraphQL，只需点击几下即可构建内部工具。
GraphQL.description: 通过 ILLA Cloud 的 GraphQL 集成，您可以快速轻松地配置和连接到您的 GraphQL API，以优化您的数据管理并简化您的工作流程。该集成允许您轻松地从 GraphQL API 检索和操作数据，从而简化了数据管理。您可以通过提供输入（包括必要的 GraphQL 查询）并结合基于应用程序的验证检查来安全地添加或写入数据。例如，您可以从 GraphQL API 检索数据并添加一个按钮，单击该按钮会执行查询以更新数据或批准请求。通过 ILLA Cloud 的 GraphQL 集成，您可以简化数据管理流程并利用 GraphQL 的强大功能来提高您的工作效率。

MariaDB.description: 通过 ILLA Cloud 的 MariaDB 集成，您可以快速轻松地配置和连接到您的 MariaDB 数据库，以优化您的数据管理并简化您的工作流程。该集成使用 SQL 简化了数据管理，使您可以轻松地操作表、检索数据和执行复杂的查询.您可以通过提供输入（包括必要的查询）并结合基于应用程序的验证检查来安全地添加或写入数据。例如，您可以从 MariaDB 表中获取员工的数据并添加一个按钮，单击该按钮将运行 SQL 查询更新员工信息或批准请求。借助 ILLA Cloud 的 MariaDB 集成，您可以最大限度地发挥数据源的潜力，并以最小的努力提高您的工作效率。

Hugging Face Inference Endpoint.name: 隐藏面部输入端点
Hugging Face Inference Endpoint.title: 使用 ILLA Cloud 连接到拥抱面推理端点，只需点击几下即可构建内部工具。
Hugging Face Inference Endpoint.description: 通过 ILLA Cloud 的 Hugging Face Inference Endpoint 集成，您可以快速轻松地配置和连接到 Hugging Face 强大的自然语言处理模型，以优化您的数据管理并简化您的工作流程。该集成通过利用 Hugging Face 的 API 端点简化了数据管理，使您能够轻松检索和操作数据。您可以通过提供输入（包括必要的 API 调用）并结合基于应用程序的验证检查来安全地添加或写入数据。例如，您可以从外部源检索文本数据并将其传递给拥抱面推理端点以执行情绪分析或语言翻译。通过 ILLA Cloud 的 Hugging Face Inference Endpoint 集成，您可以简化数据管理流程并利用 Hugging Face 自然语言处理模型的强大功能来提高您的工作效率。

Supabase DB.name: Supabase DB
Supabase DB.title: Connect to SupabaseDB with ILLA Cloud and build internal tools in just a few clicks.
Supabase DB.description: With ILLA Cloud's SupabaseDB integration, you can quickly configure and connect to your SupabaseDB database to optimize your data management and streamline your workflows.The integration simplifies data management using SupabaseDB queries and API calls, allowing you to easily manipulate data and perform complex operations. You can safely add or write data by providing input, including necessary queries, and incorporating app-based validation checks.For example, you can retrieve data from a SupabaseDB table and add a button that, when clicked, performs an API call to update the data or approve a request. With ILLA Cloud's SupabaseDB integration, you can streamline your data management process and leverage the powerful capabilities of SupabaseDB to enhance your productivity.

Radio group.name: Radio group
Radio group.title: Use the Radio Group Component in ILLA Cloud to build internal tools in just a few clicks.
Radio group.description: The Radio Group component in ILLA Cloud provides a straightforward and efficient way for users to select one option from a list, saving time and reducing errors.For example, a user can create a form for event registration and use the 'Radio Group' component to allow users to select their preferred event, simplifying the registration process and improving efficiency.

Bar progress.name: Bar progress
Bar progress.title: Use the Bar Progress Component in ILLA Cloud to build internal tools in just a few clicks.
Bar progress.description: The Bar Progress component in ILLA Cloud visually represents progress on a bar with a 100% scale, making it easy for users to track their progress quickly and efficiently.By providing a clear and concise visual representation of progress, users can easily understand how far along they are on a particular task or project without having to spend time calculating the percentage of completion, saving valuable time and allowing them to focus on more important tasks.

Video.name: Video

Hugging Face Inference API.name: Hugging Face Inference API
Hugging Face Inference API.title: Connect to Hugging Face Inference API with ILLA Cloud and build internal tools in just a few clicks.
Hugging Face Inference API.description: With ILLA Cloud's Hugging Face Inference API integration, you can quickly and easily connect to Hugging Face's powerful natural language processing models to optimize your data management and streamline your workflows.The integration simplifies data management by leveraging Hugging Face's API endpoints, allowing you to retrieve and manipulate data with ease. You can safely add or write data by providing input, including necessary API calls, and incorporating app-based validation checks.For example, you can retrieve text data from an external source and pass it through a Hugging Face API call to perform sentiment analysis or language translation. With ILLA Cloud's Hugging Face Inference API integration, you can streamline your data management process and leverage the powerful capabilities of Hugging Face's natural language processing models to enhance your productivity.

Select.name: Select

Select.description: The Select component in ILLA Cloud allows users to select from a list of options, providing a user-friendly and space-efficient way to input data, which can save users' time and increase efficiency.For example, a user can create a survey form and use the 'Select' component to provide a range of options for users to choose from, simplifying the process and ensuring accurate data collection.

Circle Progress.name: Circle Progress
Circle Progress.title: Use the Circle Progress Component in ILLA Cloud to build internal tools in just a few clicks.
Circle Progress.description: The Circle Progress component in ILLA Cloud is designed to show progress on a circular shape, providing users with a visually appealing way to track progress.This component can save users time by allowing them to quickly and easily see the progress of a task or project without having to manually calculate the percentage, helping them to identify areas that may need additional attention or resources and communicate progress to team members and stakeholders in a clear and concise manner.

Cascader.name: Cascader
Cascader.title: Use the Cascader Component in ILLA Cloud to build internal tools in just a few clicks.
Cascader.description: The Cascader component in ILLA Cloud enables users to select one option from multiple layers of choices, providing a hierarchical and efficient approach to data input and management.For example, a user can create a form for product selection and use the 'Cascader' component to allow users to choose their preferred product category, brand, and model, improving the accuracy and efficiency of data collection.

List.name: List
List.title: Use the List Component in ILLA Cloud to build internal tools in just a few clicks.
List.description: The List component provides an organized and efficient way to view and manage data, saving users time by allowing them to quickly access and manipulate information.For example, a sales manager can use the List component to view and track customer orders, quickly identifying trends and making data-driven decisions. Overall, the List component can improve productivity and enhance data analysis.

Appwrite.name: Appwrite
Appwrite.title: Connect to Appwrite with ILLA Cloud and build internal tools in just a few clicks.
Appwrite.description: With ILLA Cloud's Appwrite integration, you can quickly and easily connect to the open-source backend server platform to optimize your data management and streamline your workflows.The integration simplifies data management by leveraging Appwrite's API endpoints, allowing you to easily manipulate data from your Appwrite databases, storage and authentication services. You can safely add or write data by providing input, including necessary API calls, and incorporating app-based validation checks.For example, you can retrieve data from an Appwrite database and add a button that, when clicked, performs an API call to update the data or approve a request. With ILLA Cloud's Appwrite integration, you can streamline your data management process and leverage the powerful capabilities of Appwrite to enhance your productivity.

Tabs.name: Tabs
Tabs.title: Use the Tab Component in ILLA Cloud to build internal tools in just a few clicks.
Tabs.description: The 'Tab' component in ILLA Cloud saves users time by allowing them to easily switch between different sections of content without the need for extensive scrolling.For example, a user can use Tabs to switch between different views or modes in a software application, improving usability and productivity.

Chart.name: Chart
Chart.title: Use the Chart Component in ILLA Cloud to build internal tools in just a few clicks.
Chart.description: The 'Chart' component in ILLA Cloud displays various chart types based on linked data, providing a clear and visually appealing way to analyze complex information. Users can easily compare data points and identify trends, making it an efficient tool for decision-making. For example, a sales team can use a chart to visualize their revenue and identify areas for improvement. Overall, the Chart component can save users time by simplifying the process of data analysis and presenting information in an easily understandable format.

Menu.name: Menu
Menu.title: Use the Menu Component in ILLA Cloud to build internal tools in just a few clicks.
Menu.description: By utilizing the Menu component, users can quickly access different options without having to navigate through multiple pages, saving time and increasing efficiency.For example, a user can use the Menu component to access various features of a software application, allowing them to easily access frequently used functions and streamline their workflow.

Date Time.name: Date Time
Date Time.title: Use the Date Time Component in ILLA Cloud to build internal tools in just a few clicks.
Date Time.description: The Date Time component in ILLA Cloud simplifies date and time selection by providing a calendar-based interface, improving the efficiency and accuracy of data management.For example, a user can create a form for appointment scheduling and use the 'Date Time' component to allow users to select the specific date and time, reducing the potential for scheduling errors and streamlining the process.

classify.label: feature
classify.title: What sets ILLA Cloud apart from others?
classify.description: ILLA Cloud's SQL Generate feature and JavaScript freedom, along with its seamless integration with databases and APIs, make it an efficient tool for developers building internal tools with drag-and-drop components in real time.

itemList.itemDesc: With the embedded Chatgpt Plugin, you can input natural language and get SQL statements that can be run directly.
We provide developers JavaScript freedom by wrapping JS statements with {{Template Syntax}} to add variety to the output.
ILLA Cloud connects to databases and APIs, and integrates back-end data with front-end components, simplifying data calls for massive information interaction.
ILLA turns imagination into real code and designs with real-time collaboration in ILLA Builder, improving development efficiency.
ILLA Builder's dozens of components can be dragged and dropped, saving time and boosting developer productivity.

classify.label: Templates
classify.title: What can you build with ILLA?
classify.description: ILLA Cloud offers a variety of components, such as tables, charts, forms, lists, etc. Users can easily build dashboards, admin panels, survey forms, and more using these components.

itemList.itemDesc: Use tables and charts to create a dashboard.
Use form and input components to create form apps.
Use a list component to display and manage information.
